mapper.sql: select stat_time, total_cnt, succ_cnt, fail_cnt, angry_cnt, stress_cnt, incr_cnt, decr_cnt from mecs5_service_stat_hourly
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select stat_time, sum(total_cnt) as total_cnt, sum(succ_cnt) as succ_cnt, sum(fail_cnt) as fail_cnt, sum(angry_cnt) as angry_cnt, sum(stress_cnt) as stress_cnt, sum(incr_cnt) as incr_cnt, sum(decr_cnt) as decr_cnt from mecs5_agent_stat_hourly
and date_format(stat_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') >= #{searchDTO.startDate} and date_format(stat_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H') <= #{searchDTO.endDate}
and agent_id in (${searchDTO.searchId})
and agent_id in ( select agent_id from mecs5_agent where group_id=#{searchDTO.searchGroup} )
group by date_format(stat_time, '%d%H') ) cnt
